articles.title: ALP president Wayne Swan cautions against Beijing Winter Olympics boycott - 9News
articles.description: National ALP president Wayne Swan has cautioned against a Beijing Winter Olympics boycott, as concern remains over the safety of tennis star Peng Shuai.
